name.title: What is you favorite series of all time?
name.body: Could be a book series, comic series, tv series or movie series. If there are any other kinds of series I missed they're fair play to. Just give me the best series of all time.

name.title: Why do we need crypto?
name.body:
What are some egregious real world examples that clearly demonstrate why we need crypto (e.g. currency, tokens, collectibles) in the world today and in the future?

\- _coinster_

name.title: What are you cooking up now for your future?
name.body:
I'm interested to see what others hope to be doing in the future and what steps they are taking now to try to connect the dots to their future dreams. 

For me I am just in the planning phase. Like I'm recording and reviewing the projects and dishes I've come up with and checking out how others organize and distribute their contents. There is so much opportunity these days it seems. Good luck everybody!

name.title: What do you think of Tok'n'talk?
name.body:
Tok'n'talk is a social platform for token holders.

[[http://tokntalk.club/](http://tokntalk.club/)](http://tokntalk.club/)

Just wondering about your general opinion. How do you understand the product? What do you find confusing?

name.title: Avoid FOMO for 0xUniverse is quiter than usual, but as they say, this is the calm before the storm
name.body:
[0xUniverse](https://0xuniverse.com/?utm_source=betacent&utm_medium=fomo3108&utm_campaign=brandawareness) is here to stay, guys! The devs got some good news and more is coming pretty soon.

First, Cointelegraph got a [video about blockchain games featuring the game](http://youtu.be/1xOM1NreoeE)!

Second, a referral program with neat planetary rewards is in the works! You can already join the community [here ](https://discordapp.com/invite/UcGGApF)and ask around or wait till the full version of the ref program comes out.

Something big (apart from mobile) is coming. That is in the air (or space, to be precise).

I bet if you join the community and buy up some planets which are now at the lowest prices possible, you won't miss out on a feverish sellout that will come later. Just my 2 cents.

name.body: **_Show me the best memes of anything out there _**

name.title: Name some ways to make some extra income
name.body: _**Just wondering how to make some income online , I know about surveys but is there anything else ? **_

name.title: What have you been working on besides your current job to make extra income?
name.body: How did you find those side gigs? Do you like them?

name.title: Create memes
name.body:
So MilliMeme is live at: [https://www.cryptomilli.com/](https://www.cryptomilli.com/)

\* 1 task: create a meme. (with 2Gwei it will cost you about $0.74 I think)

Post the transaction hash after you did, for very funny ones I'll do my best to tip you. Ready? Go!!!

name.title: What would you order? *time sensitive*
name.body:
So I'm really hungry but can't decide what to order for dinner from [Shuttle Delivery](https://www.shuttledelivery.co.kr/en).  Check out the restaurants I can order food from on their site and let me know what you'd order.

I wanna get my order in within the hour, so **any replies that respond within 60 minutes of this posting with legit orders will get tipped $0.50.**
